'''The Jade Mystery''' is a [[shop]] in [[Chihu Rock]], [[Liyue Harbor]], [[Liyue]], that sells ores. It is currently run by [[Shitou]].

His stock refreshes every 3 days, but the types of ores he offers do not change.

The Jade Mystery is involved in the random commission quest [[Diamond in the Rough...]].
